segments.text: There's a woman at the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's holding a plate and a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is running into the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water level is high, spilling over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It flows down to the floor in a sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy stands on a stool nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands beside the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her arm is up toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above shows a garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes and a fence in the background.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen has open cabinets and stacked dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR
